title: I hate insta - thunderlords abilities
body:
I don't think thunderlords was ever designed to proc off of a single ability which hits very fast. The way its worded implies three SEPARATE spells: procs on "your third hit by attack or damaging spell"

That's obviously not what happens and some abilities which hit every 0.25 seconds like {{champion:68}} flamethrower just thunderlords you before you could ever get out of them in time. Old {{champion:105}}  did it too. He would w-q and the DOT, flat magic damage and q would all count separately and thunderlords would proc with a SINGLE hit. Also {{champion:103}} w, if it doesn't hit minions and all goes on the champion.

Everyone loves {{champion:134}} outplays where they hit you will "three" spells to get that thunderskills off. Pressing r on you is CLEARLY three separate spells right....... lol

If they desired to reduce burst in the game, I think re-coding this ability to be truly 3 different spells or different auto attacks WITHOUT counting passives it would be much better. A passive example is lux hits you with e + auto attack, that pops her passive for a "third" damaging spell and procs thunderlords after what really should be thought of as a spell + empowered auto for 2 stacks. 

IMO thunderlords should proc ONCE off of every spell cast ie pressing a qwer button. If you press the same key twice it could still count twice, like {{champion:101}} ultimate.

I dont know what that means but basically spells like lux's passive where she can e auto you for tlords will eventually be fixed so im guessing so will your examples. Just give it time.
